panel.title: ILS Automation Installer for Batch Expert+
panel.preamble: This is a special version of the ILS Automation installer built for demonstration of P&ID updates of the "RWDC" BE+ installation. This installer simply adds a demonstration project and optionally replaces OPC with memory tags for test/demonstration. It is designed to be run on a system with an existing RWDC installation.

panel.title: Install Memory Tags for RWDC
panel.preamble: This page creates memory-tag versions of user-defined-tags for RWDC. The definitions are written to the "default" tag provider. These tags are for test/demonstration only.

panel.title: Install Instance Tags for RWDC
panel.preamble: This page adds unit tags for RWDC. The definitions are written to the "default" tag provider. These tags are production versions.

panel.title: Install BatchExpert+ 2.6 - Specially assembled for RWDC
panel.preamble: Create Batch Expert+ 2.6 for RWDC, specially enhanced to demonstrate P&ID screeens.
